subject: Ponzi Schemes
lead_paragraph: The widow of a former employee of Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz says in a lawsuit that fiduciary duties were breached when employees were allowed to invest with Bernard L. Madoff.
snippet: The widow of a former employee of Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz says in a lawsuit that fiduciary duties were breached when employees were allowed to invest with Bernard L. Madoff.
